import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { v4 as uuidv4 } from 'uuid'; import PostInputBar from './PostInputBar' import { Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { RiWalkFill } from "react-icons/ri"; import { FcLike } from "react-icons/fc"; import { FcSms } from "react-icons/fc"; import { useSelector, useDispatch, } from 'react-redux' import { fetchPosts, addLikes } from '../redux/actions' const Feeds = () => { useEffect(() => { dispatch(fetchPosts()) }, []) const allPosts = useSelector(state => state.posts.posts) const postLikes = useSelector(state => state.posts.likes) const postLikesLength = useSelector(state => state.posts.likes.length) console.log(postLikesLength, postLikes) const dispatch = useDispatch() const ID = uuidv4() // const fixDate = formatDistanceToNow(new Date(), { includeSeconds: true }) // console.log(fixDate) return (
{allPosts?.reverse().map((post) => ( <>
{post.user.username}
posted at {post.createdAt}
{post.text}
dispatch(addLikes(post))} className="text-sm flex align-items-center cursor-pointer ">
< FcLike />
Like {postLikesLength}
Comment
Follow
)) }
) } export default Feeds
